main event: A white light was observed in the western sky moving up and to the left.
interesting points: The object appeared bright but smaller than a star.,The object moved rapidly and evenly, about 10 degrees of arc in 1-2 minutes.,The observation was made through an open window.,No sound was heard during the sighting.,The report concludes with possible explanations including aircraft, balloon, or satellite.
sighted object: a white light in the sky
witness description: Observation was made visually through an open window.
